function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Complex urban environment and man-made containers as oviposition sites for mosquitoes","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increase in mosquito-borne diseases due to excess vegetation and green zones","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Thermal discomfort in tropical countries due to excessive vegetal mass","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Varied effectiveness of greening strategies in different climatic conditions","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Spread of malaria vector to new geographical areas","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of knowledge of key epidemiological drivers for urban vector-borne diseases","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increasing urbanization and growth of urban mosquito vector species","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Heat island effect in urban areas","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Spread of invasive mosquito vectors","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Spread of novel arboviruses into new areas","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Urban malaria transmission and adaptation of mosquito vectors","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Global spread of viruses like zika and chikungunya across 73 countries and leading to public health emergencies","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Spread of invasive mosquito species competent for arbovirus transmission, including zika and chikungunya","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Territorial expansion of aedes spp. incriminated as vectors for arboviruses and parasitic nematodes","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased local temperatures due to urbanization leading to higher incidence of mosquito-borne diseases such as dengue, zika, and yellow fever","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Climate-associated changes in precipitation disproportionately affecting urban and rural environments in terms of mosquito oviposition sites","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Challenges in estimating urban mosquito species distributions and abundance, leading to poor estimation of urban disease exposure","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Global warming leading to an increased burden of mosquito-borne diseases","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Globalization and increased international travel enabling the importation of invasive mosquito vectors and pathogens","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Temperature modifications influencing the epidemic potential of mosquito-borne diseases","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increase in heat-related deaths due to hotter days and more frequent heatwaves","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increase in chronic obstructive pulmonary disease and cardio-vascular disease due to particulate matter and wildfires","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Worsening of air quality and increase in airborne allergens leading to allergic diseases like asthma and rhino-conjunctivitis","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased urbanization leading to limited understanding of urban health and disparities","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Creation of urban heat islands uhis due to greenhouse gas production and urbanization","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Local-scale variation in uhi intensity due to urban geometry","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Climate change leading to increased health burden","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased risk of urban mosquito-borne diseases","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Urbanization leading to higher environmental challenges for human health","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increase in global average temperature","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Uneven distribution of impacts of climate change","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Impacts of climate change on human health","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Relocation of health care personnel hcp to new aiirs","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Sharing devices and equipment among hcp","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Comparison and publication of infection rates","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Pressure differentials not maintained in aiirs","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unintended door opening in temporary aiirs","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate negative pressure in patient rooms and anterooms","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unclear guidelines for pressure differentials and air changes per hour","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate maintenance and monitoring of negative air machines","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Transmission of infectious particles from isolation rooms into the corridor due to lack of anterooms","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ineffective design and construction of anterooms leading to difficulty in using ppe and disinfecting medical devices","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate size of anterooms leading to insufficient space for health care workers to operate","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate number of aiirs airborne infection isolation rooms for severely affected covid-19 patients","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate room size and equipment for critical covid-19 patients requiring extracorporeal membrane oxygenation, mechanical ventilation, or continuous renal replacement therapy","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of anterooms for partitioning to create additional aiirs","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Shortage of medical resources including medical personnel, medicine, and equipment","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Shortage of airborne-infection isolation rooms aiirs for covid-19 patients","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Need for rapid expansion of aiir capacity to prevent infection spread to medical personnel and other patients","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Insufficient analysis or prediction of virus transmission risks at an architectural scale","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"}]}
